albania: Invasion of Yugoslavia: Germany, Italy, Hungary, Bulgaria, Romania and the Croatian Ustaše invaded Yugoslavia.
Axis occupation of Greece during World War II: Greece was partitioned between Germany, Italy and Bulgaria, with Italy occupying the bulk of the Greek mainland and most of the islands.
Josip Broz Tito, leader of the Communist Party of Yugoslavia, began to organize Albanian Communists.
The Albanian Communist Party was founded under First Secretary Enver Hoxha.
